title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 518.6 - Recoupment of overpayments
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 518.6 - Recoupment of overpayments

State Regulations
(a) Overpayments may be recovered by
withholding all or part of a provider's and an affiliate's payments otherwise
payable, at the option of the department. (b) Any money due to the provider from the
department may be used as an offset against any overpayments. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
518.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
